description: girl with shoulder-length hair, wearing white pinafore, in profile from right, carrying a long branch of a grape vine
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscriptions, Edition and Stamp

on back, in pencil: [96.0.9] and [152075]
markings: LRC, in pencil: [tr. 35. / no 19]; LRC, stamped in red: [AB]
provenance: André Barrier, Lugt 70c (born 1870), Paris. [Eric G. Carlson, New York, until 1996; sold in July for KKOO with preparatory drawing of same title, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1996-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in pencil: [A Lepere]; LLC, in pencil: [Vendemiare]
title: Grape Harvester
